                                      +--CH.ifa.draw.contrib.SplitPaneDrawApplication
public class SplitPaneDrawApplication
extends DrawApplication

A specialised DrawApplication, which offers basic support for a simple splitted pane content.

Version:
JHotDraw 5.2 31.08.1999
See Also:
Serialized Form
